content:
To find a performer or speaker who fits your theme and is available for your event, here are some steps you can take:

1. Do some research: Start by doing some online research to find performers or speakers who specialize in your theme. You can use search engines, social media platforms or specialized websites such as Gig Salad, Eventbrite or Meetup to find professional entertainers and speakers.

2. Ask for referrals: Ask friends and family members for referrals to performers or speakers they have hired in the past or have seen perform. This is a good way to find reliable and high-quality performers.

3. Read reviews and ratings: Read reviews and ratings of the performers or speakers you are interested in. Check their reputation online, read their reviews and testimonials, and make sure they have a history of delivering great performances and speeches.

4. Contact the performer or speaker: Once you have a list of potential performers or speakers, reach out to them to inquire about their availability and fees. Provide them with details about your event, such as the date, time, location, and theme, and ask if they have any experience performing in similar events.

5. Negotiate a contract: Once you have found the right performer or speaker, negotiate a contract that includes their fees, performance details, and any other obligations they might have. Make sure you sign a written agreement and pay a deposit to secure their services.

By following these steps, you can find a performer or speaker who will fit your theme and make your dinner party a memorable and entertaining event.
